long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Impero Education Pro Chrome Extension enables you to manage and control devices running Google Chrome OS on your network…
The Impero Education Pro Chrome Extension enables you to manage and control devices running Google Chrome OS on your network helping to ensure that students are on task, learning and safe.

For support in relation to the Chrome Impero Education Pro App and Extension, including installation and configuration, please visit https://www.imperosoftware.com/uk/support/ for further information
